notes.notes1:
"For the purposes of binding." Written over directions to the well house.

Harpy earpiece = mark of loyalty to "the cause" "the boss"

Handler in the well
Guarding against both things coming in and coming out of the well.
Have to wear funny hats.

The Big Man is pulling off some sort of crazy scheme in Squallport.
notes.notes2:
Father Gord
   Priest, person who hired the party to investigate the spoiling of the food in Gordsberg.
Nick
     Apprentice to Father Gord.
Ivan
     Policeman.
Damien.
     At the Dusty Dancer. Owes a debt (20 GP) to The Big Man.
Jack
      Works for The Big Man as a collector. Came to collected Damien's debt. Works for Snipes. Also collected from Boroguard (7 GP) and Lin (22 GP).
Snipes
     The Big Man's administrator / accountant / secretary. Called such because he can often guess what happened on a job.
The Big Man
     Tall but "well fed". Wears a feather cape that drapes around his neck. Hat with a feather in it.
     Collects fancy weapons.
     Loanshark.
Dan
     Low-level administrator in the Squaleport Police (Ad hoc institution for independent vigilante contractors).
Ken
     Former co-worker with Vickmar. Roosting Kodiac.
